name: elaine
description: This is elaine! A minimalistic tile-matching action game by Slight Super Powers. In this deceptively simple game, you'll have to deal with a shifting screen, multi-colored patterns of increasing speed and complexity, and an unrelenting countdown timer synced to brain-pumping music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 (or later) Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core 2.0 GHz (or equivalent) Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 (or later) Compatible Graphics Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 125 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
